All the power of Pods, made easy

== Description ==

Easily create complex queries and beautiful search forms for your Pods content using the Caldera Easy Pods. Caldera Easy Pods provides a simple visual editor for creating complex queries for Pods data

Pods is a free, and no-cost WordPress custom content types and fields framework. Pods makes it easy to add custom content types–post types, taxonomies, even custom tables–and custom fields to your WordPress site using a simple  admin interface. Querying for Pods data can be complicated. Caldera Easy Pods makes getting exactly the right data you need easy.

== Installation ==

1. From the WordPress plugin installer, select "upload" and then upload this plugin.
1. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
